attributes.action: Place an age restriction for the sale and usage of disposable barbecues
attributes.additional_details: Moorland and forest fires have increased recently due to improper usage of disposable barbecues used by youths. This has caused extra pressure on our fire service and their resources and hundreds of acres of natural habitats have subsequently been damaged.
attributes.background: To put an age restriction on the sale and usage of disposable barbecues to protect our fire service, residents and the natural habitat.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/328763
